you'll be in a pretty position without your boots!" (The staff officer smiled.) "Kindly return to your posts, gentlemen, all of you, all!" he added in a tone of command. 
Prince Andrew smiled involuntarily as he looked at the artillery officer Tushin, who si- lent and smiling, shifting from one stockinged foot to the other, glanced inquiringly with his large, intelligent, kindly eyes from Prince An- drew to the staff officer. 
"The soldiers say it feels easier without boots," said Captain Tu
